publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1338 Mr Sam Galbraith: The Scotland Act 1998 (Cross-Border Public Authorities) (Adaptation of Functions etc.) (No.2) Order 2000-That the Transport and the Environment Committee recommends that the draft The Scotland Act 1998 (Cross-Border Public Authorities) (Adaptation of Functions etc.) (No.2) Order 2000 be approved. Supported by: Allan Wilson*
